name: Hexahedron (Denis Zaiko)
description:
Name: Hexahedron

Genre: Platformer

Goal: Get to the top of each level to finish the game

Levels: There are 3 levels in the game: Forest, Desert, and Ash. Each level gets harder than the rest.

Platforming: You will have to jump from one place to another to reach the top. Some of the obstacles are unique, with different rotations and placements.

Visuals: I found all objects and textures in the Unity Asset Store, and got my music from Free Sounds! There is also a "jump" sound effect, which I made myself. :)
